name: cereal
instructions: 1. Put cereal into bowl;2. Fill bowl with milk

name: mac and cheese
instructions: 1. Bring a pot of water to a bowl.;2. Cook macaroni in boiling water, melt butter in saucepan over medium heat.;3. Add flour salt and pepper until smooth.;4. Pour in milk slowly and stir until bubbling.;5. Add cheese and stir until melted.;6. Drain macaroni and fold into sauce until coated.

name: grilled cheese
instructions: 1. Butter the outer sides of two bread slices.;2. Place the bread, butter side down, on a pan over medium heat.;3. Top it with cheese slices.;4. Allow to brown slightly before flipping.;5. Slice the grilled cheese sandwich and serve.

name: dumplings
ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour,2 tsp baking powder,1 tsp white sugar,1/2 tsp salt,1 tbsp margarine,1/2 cup milk,
instructions: 1. Stir together flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a bowl.;2. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly and stir in milk.;3. Mix until a batter forms that is thick enough to be scooped with a spoon.;4. Allow batter to rest for 3-5 minutes.;5. Drop batter by spoonfuls into a boiling stew or soup.;6. Cover and simmer iwthout lifting the lid for 15 minutes. serve.;
